title: Will all the sins of a Martyr be pardoned on the day of judgement? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: dia says if a person is martyred in the cause of Allah but he had sins like backbiting fornication etc would it be erased insha'Allah it would be erased the reward of martyrdom nothing stands in its way except that the Prophet said RA salatu salam all the sins of a martyr is erased except for the deaths this is what gibreel told him so lala haria you seldom
